verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
B minor
Sing alleluia to the Lord,
(sisters echo)
Sing alleluia to the Lord, (echo)
Sing alleluia, sing alleluia,
(Alleluia)
Sing alleluia to the Lord!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus is risen from the dead,
(sisters echo)
Jesus is risen from the dead, (echo)
Jesus is risen, Jesus is risen,
(Alleluia)
Jesus is risen from the dead!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus is Lord of heaven and earth,
(sisters echo)
Jesus is Lord of heaven and earth, (echo)
Jesus is Lord, Jesus is Lord,
(Alleluia)
Jesus is Lord of heaven and earth!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jesus is reigning in His Church,
(sisters echo)
Jesus is reigning in His Church, (echo)
Jesus is reigning, Jesus is reigning,
(Alleluia)
Jesus is reigning in His Church!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Jesus is coming for his own,
(sisters echo)
Jesus is coming for his own, (echo)
Jesus is coming, Jesus is coming,
(Alleluia)
Jesus is coming for his own.
